meanings.definition: The state of being fully or abundantly filled or supplied.
meanings.sent1: The repleteness of the fruit basket made it a joy to behold.
meanings.sent2: The repleteness of the library shelves brought a sense of satisfaction to the librarian.
meanings.sent3: The repleteness of the picnic basket led to a delightful outdoor feast.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with a repleteness that warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The repleteness of the garden after the rain was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The quality of being complete or full.
meanings.sent1: The repleteness of the puzzle brought a sense of accomplishment to the child.
meanings.sent2: The repleteness of the cupboards made it easy to find ingredients for baking.
meanings.sent3: The repleteness of the toy box made it challenging to close the lid.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a repleteness that commanded attention in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The repleteness of the sky at sunset painted a breathtaking scene.
